Tunable.name: GO_TO_STORED_LOCATION_SI
Tunable.description: The affordance that is provided by the Stored Actor Location Component when there is a set location.

Tunable.name: UNROUTABLE_MESSAGE_NOT_CONNECTED
Tunable.description: The tooltip used when the Stored Location SI is unavailable because the stored location does not have routing connectivity to the sim.

Tunable.name: UNROUTABLE_MESSAGE_OFF_LOT
Tunable.description: The tooltip used when the Stored Location SI is unavailable because the stored location is not on the active lot.
